title: The Pedestrian strikes back
creator_credit: Jack L. Copeland, KNBC (Television station : Los Angeles, Calif.) and Copeland Productions
brief_description: Assesses the national trend of revitalising the downtown core of cities through the construction of malls, focusing upon Burbank’s Golden Mall, and comparing it with similar projects throughout California. Authorities analyse the need for malls and discuss the difficulties encountered in providing them.
